derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent. (in the sense 'massage (as part of a Turkish bath process'): from Hindi cāmapo! 'press!', imperative of cāmpnā

encyclopedia.content: 英文翻译 shampoo名词 意为：洗发剂；香波乐队 Shampoo20世纪90年代英国的一个全女子乐队，由 Jacqui Blake和 Carrie Askew组成。 她们最有名的歌曲是， 'Trouble'.何韵诗演唱歌曲歌曲歌词 站在那满架新货的超市 望著数百种洗发水 兴奋地埋头在试 为你用惯的味儿胡乱试 合著眼每樽开盖吸一次 为著买你的洗发水整天也漫游超市 红黄绿白一支支排好了来面试 幸福感觉若然变能有樽装 拧开樽盖被期待的即刻到访 长长路遗下一人仍然像你

entry.def: Shampoo is a soapy liquid that you use for washing your hair.
When you shampoo your hair, you wash it using shampoo.

example.ex: Shampoo your hair and dry it.
example.tran: 用洗发液洗洗头发然后擦干。

means.word_mean: 1. cleansing agent consisting of soaps or detergents used for washing the hair
2. the act of washing your hair with shampoo

auth_sentence.content: Rinse your hair well, ideally twice with every shampoo.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rinse your hair well, ideally twice with every shampoo.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rinse your hair well, ideally twice with every shampoo.

auth_sentence.content: This often happens, just switch to a new shampoo.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: This often happens, just switch to a new shampoo.

auth_sentence.content: This shampoo and conditioner leave hair shiny with no residue.
auth_sentence.res_content: This shampoo and conditioner leave hair shiny with no residue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This shampoo and conditioner leave hair shiny with no residue.

sentences.en: I want to have a shampoo.
How often do you shampoo your hair?
